content: रत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [रम्-कर्तरि क्त] {@--1@} Pleased, delighted, gratified. {@--2@} Pleased or delighted with, fond of, enamoured of, fondly attached to. {@--3@} Inclined to, disposed. {@--4@} Loved, beloved. {@--5@} Intent on, engaged in, devoted to; (see रम्). --तं {@--1@} Pleasure. {@--2@} Sexual union, coition; <ls>R. 19. 23</ls>, <ls n="R. 19.">25</ls>; <ls>Me. 89.</ls> {@--3@} The private parts.
